thread.title: ‘Where have you been’? Dem Rep. Cummings suddenly realizes Congress’ job
thread.title_full: ‘Where have you been’? Dem Rep. Cummings suddenly realizes Congress’ job

author: Sarah D.
title: ‘Where have you been’? Dem Rep. Cummings suddenly realizes Congress’ job
text:
— Justin S. (@Sparky02gt) January 11, 2017 @ABCPolitics @RepCummings it's always been the job of Congress to check the executive branch. Haven't you ever taken a US government class? 
— Jason T (@AircraftSparky) January 11, 2017 @ABCPolitics @RepCummings Always delightful when Democrats suddenly rediscover the #constitution 
— . (@jacob_65) January 11, 2017 
It’s great that a Democratic congressman is acknowledging that we have a system of checks and balances. But it would’ve been a whole lot nicer if Dems had given a crap about its importance for the past eight years. @ABCPolitics And where has @RepCummings been for the last 8 years? 
— Fred Nicolaysen (@phred47) January 11, 2017 @ABCPolitics @RepCummings where were you for the past 8 years??? Hypocrites!!! 
— Peter Duane (@peterjduane) January 11, 2017 @ABCPolitics Where have you been @RepCummings for the past 8 years, bro?!
